kv9.3:1.3: Atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:1.5: nanu natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:1.7: Hañci natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.3:2.1: ☑ Phasso sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:2.3: Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:3.2: saññā cetanā cittaṃ saddhā vīriyaṃ sati samādhi paññā rāgo doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ …pe…
kv9.3:3.3: anottappaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:3.5: Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:4.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:4.3: Phasso sārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:5.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:5.4: anottappaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:6.6: Hañci rūpaṃ sappaccayaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
